title: Toby
description: Toby is a high quality male prostitute living in Barcelona who is having trouble giving up drugs and the party lifestyle.When he meets Jakob, a handsome gay Danish guy, he's confronted by his feelings for him and attracted to his innocence. He can see himself giving up the drugs with Jakob around.Then Ariana comes into his life, a successful and beautiful woman from New York. She represents everything he wants to be and is drawn in by her beauty and her energy.He's torn between the man of his dreams and the woman of his dreams. The problem is, neither of them know he's a prostitute and a heavy drug user.Can Toby make the changes his life needs and fall in love with the right person?
author: Fox Emerson
